content: समुच्चयः {@--1@} Collection, assemblage, aggregation, mass, multitude. {@--2@} Conjunction of words or sentences; see च. {@--3@} A figure of speech; <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> (Kārikās 115 and 116), (it consists in joining together two or more things, independent of each other, but connected in idea with reference to some common action).
